changeSet.author: astrauss (generated)
changeSet.sql:
CREATE proc [dbo].[sp_run_test_case] as
create table #temp_case (case_number char(11))
insert into #temp_case select top 50 case_number from lrsextdb..lrs_case_record
declare case_number_crsr cursor for select case_number from #temp_case
declare @case_number char(11)
open case_number_crsr
FETCH NEXT FROM case_number_crsr INTO @case_number
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 BEGIN
exec sp_get_case @case_number
FETCH NEXT FROM case_number_crsr INTO @case_number
end
